name: Corrupting Ooze
description: The Corrupting Ooze is a large, putrid mass with the ability to reshape its form. It is often seen as a dark and amorphous entity that exudes a foul stench.
memorable: Its ability to destroy nonmagical items with its attacks makes it a disruptive force in combat.
goals: To engulf and incapacitate foes while causing destruction through its toxic nature.
relations: Often found in dark, damp environments, it may be encountered alongside other corrupted creatures or as a manifestation of decay.
environment: Dark, damp areas like swamps, caves, or ruined places.
strengths: Immune to poison damage and resistant to physical damage types.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity impacts its agility, making it less maneuverable.
attacks: Multiattack with two Slam attacks can devastate targets and potentially destroy their items.
most_powerful_ability: Putrid Stench can incapacitate and harm nearby creatures with poison damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings without relying on sight.
skills: Good stealth skills enable it to move quietly and surprise opponents.
additional_information: Does not require sleep, allowing for prolonged combat endurance.
Can reshape its form into a vaguely humanoid shape.
Effective at melee combat due to high Strength and Constitution scores.
Low Intelligence and Charisma make it ineffective in social situations.
Condition Immunities include being blinded, charmed, or frightened.
test_queries: large poison slime with stench attack
ooze that can reshape into humanoid
toxic mass with brutal melee attacks
